description.brief: OctoMap - A probabilistic, flexible, and compact 3D mapping library for robotic systems.
description.p: The OctoMap library implements a 3D occupancy grid mapping approach, p roviding data structures and mapping algorithms. The map implementation is based on an octree.
More details are available at http://octomap.sourceforge.net/.

package.author: Kai M. Wurm and Armin Hornung. ROS package by Armin Hornung.
